name: Shadow theater
description: Illusion magic distracts the opponent and steals his card

name: Blessing of Kynareth
description: Kynareth blesses you and heals your wounds

name: Time loop
description: Bends time to allow an additional action.

name: Great frost
description: A treacherous cold that pierces the opponent to the bone

name: Stunning Blow
description: A powerful hit that interrupts the enemy.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: Blinds the target, forcing them to skip their next turn.

name: Pickpocket
description: Steal a random card from the enemy's hand.

name: Haste
description: Grants the caster an extra turn.
